item.title: New module: devel/gcl version 2.6.14
item.description: GCL is the official Common Lisp for the GNU project.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/geos version 3.12.1
item.description: GEOS is a C/C++ library for computational geometry with a focus on algorithms used in geographic information systems (GIS) software.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/kallisto version 0.50.1
item.description: kallisto is a program for quantifying abundances of transcripts from RNA-Seq data using high-throughput sequencing reads.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-matlab-proxy version 0.10.0_py39
item.description: matlab-proxy is a Python package which enables you to launch MATLAB and access it from a web browser.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/rclone version 1.65.0
item.description: Rclone is a command line program to sync files and directories to and from
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/darshan version 3.4.4
item.description: Darshan is a scalable HPC I/O characterization tool.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/py-matlab-proxy version 0.9.1_py39
item.description: matlab-proxy is a Python package which enables you to launch MATLAB and access it from a web browser.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-globus-cli version 3.19.0_py39
item.description: A command line wrapper over the Globus SDK for Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/rstudio version 2023.09.1
item.description: RStudio is an integrated development environment (IDE) for R. It includes a console, syntax-highlighting editor that supports direct code execution, as well as tools for plotting, history, debugging and workspace management.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-jupyterlab version 4.0.8_py39
item.description: Jupyter is a browser-based interactive notebook for programming, mathematics, and data science. It supports a number of languages via plugins.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/py-scikit-learn version 1.3.2_py39
item.description: Scikit-learn is a free software machine learning library for the Python programming language.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-topaz version 0.2.5_py39
item.description: A pipeline for particle detection in cryo-electron microscopy images using convolutional neural networks trained from positive and unlabeled examples.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/motioncor2 version 1.6.4
item.description: MotionCor2 is a multi-GPU accelerated program which corrects anisotropic image motion at the single pixel level.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/relion version 4.0.1
item.description: RELION (for REgularised LIkelihood OptimisatioN, pronounce rely-on) is a stand-alone computer program that employs an empirical Bayesian approach to refinement of (multiple) 3D reconstructions or 2D class averages in electron cryo-microscopy (cryo-EM).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/code-server version 4.16.1
item.description: Run VS Code on any machine anywhere and access it in the browser.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/curl version 8.4.0
item.description: curl is an open source command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
